title: FS:  T206 Raw Commons – 5 Lots - ALL SOLD
author: willworkforT206

posts.post_title: FS:  T206 Raw Commons – 5 Lots - ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
Need to clean house and sell off almost 70 raw T206 doubles.  The following LOTS are available.

High resolution scans of fronts and backs available upon request.  Send email to [url]sschris@att.net[/url].  (Having trouble uploading the scans.)

Lot 1 – 14 “Very Good” cards with common backs.  $420.00 ($30 per card average)  SOLD
All cards measure correctly.  All Piedmonts and Sweet Caporals, but includes one Sovereign 350 (Apple Green) and one Horizontal (Murphy Throwing).  

Abstein
Anderson
Bell (Hands Above Head)
Burns
Covaleski
Doolin
Dougherty (Portrait)
Feine (Throwing)
Gasper
Knabe
Murphy (Throwing) (Horizontal)
Street (Catching)
Summers
Weimer

Lot 2 – 15 “Poor/Fair” to “Good” cards all with less common backs.  $270.00 ($18 per card average)  SOLD
All cards measure correctly except for Doolin and Nattress, which measure just a touch short.   Includes one Tolstoi back (Paskert).  

Arrelanes – Polar Bear
Atz – Polar Bear
Bowerman – Sovereign 150
Burchell – Polar Bear
Davis (Davis on Front) – Sovereign 350 (Apple Green)
Doolin – Sovereign 150
Flanagan – Old Mill
Geyer – Polar Bear
Graham (Boston) – Polar Bear
Kleinow (Batting) – Sovereign 150
Lake (Ball) – Polar Bear
Nattress – Polar Bear
Paskert – Tolstoi
Snodgrass (Catching) – Polar Bear
Wilhelm (With Bat) – Polar Bear

Lot 3 – 12 “Good” cards all Piedmont or Sweet Caporal backs.  $215.00 ($17.92 per card average)  SOLD
All cards measure correctly.  Most have a light crease or minor paper loss.  Includes Merkle (Portrait)  

Burke
Egan
Graham (St. Louis)
Hartzel
Howell
Fielder Jones (Portrait)
Merkle (Portrait)
McGann
Sharpe
Lee Tannehill (L. on Front)
Wilhelm (With Bat)
Lake (No Ball)

Lot 4 – 10 “Poor/Fair” cards mostly common backs (one Sovereign). 117.00 ($13 per card average + the Fiene free)  SOLD
All have obvious condition issues.  Many have writing or marks on the back.  All cards measure correctly.  Includes one horizontal (Birmingham). 

Atz – Sovereign 350
Bescher
Birmingham (Horizontal)
Bowerman
Bransfield
Doolan (Batting)
Feine (Portrait)
Jacklitsch
Perring
Stone

Lot 5 – 18 “Authentic/Trimmed” cards. $180.00 ($10 per card average)  SOLD
Cards generally have good eye appeal but all measure short top-to-bottom – some only ever so slightly.  A few Sovereign and Polar Bear.  The ugly side of buying raw cards on ebay!  

SORRY, NOT SELLING ANY CARDS INDIVIDUALLY.  HOWEVER, I WILL CONSIDER TRADES FOR RAW SOUTHERN LEAGUERS THAT I NEED.

I did my best to honestly and conservatively assign a grade to each card.  If you are unhappy with any card in the lot after you receive it, I will buy it back from you.

Prices include insured shipping.  Cards will be shipped on Monday.

Paypal is my preferred method of payment.

PLEASE BE PATIENT WITH E-MAIL RESPONSES/CORRESPONDENCE.  I HAVE LIMITED ACCESS TO E-MAIL DURING THE DAYTIME.   I WILL REPLY TO ALL E-MAILS.  THANKS.

Thanks for looking.

Steve
If you ever decide to break up these lots, I would be interested in more than a few. If you are dead set on selling them as you have them listed, I wish the best of luck.:)
